definition[0]: to shout ‘boo’ to show that you do not like a person, performance, idea etc
example[0]: Some of the audience started booing.
example[1]: She was booed off stage  (=they shouted ‘boo’ until she left the stage).
definition[1]: a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
definition[2]: a word you shout suddenly to someone as a joke in order to frighten them
